components.description: Explain how the physical and human characteristics of places and regions are connected to human identities and cultures in Washington.

standards.title: Understands human interaction with the environment.

components.description: Analyze human changes to the environment in Washington and evaluate how those changes affect communities and ecosystems.

standards.title: Understands the geographic context of global issues and events.

components.description: Evaluate the impact of global issues on local communities in Washington.
